thread.title: Do Toilets Really Flush Backwards 'Down Under'?
thread.title_full: Do Toilets Really Flush Backwards 'Down Under'?

title: Do Toilets Really Flush Backwards 'Down Under'?
text:
Do Toilets Really Flush Backwards 'Down Under'? Rob uncovers the truth about whether toilets spin backwards in Australia. iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
